STAKE_TITLE: Start Staking, Earn, and Enjoy Rewards
STAKE_SUBTITLE_1: Feel the growth of your TON balance right in your wallet. Want to learn more?
STAKE_SUBTITLE_2: Scroll down to find out how it works and what its main advantages are.
CALCULATOR_TITLE: Calculate Your Future Income in TON Staking
CALCULATOR_SUBTITLE: You will receive 4% daily on a constant basis for 1 month
STEP_TITLE: Start TON Staking in Just 3 Steps
1-ST_STEP_DESCRIPTION: Connect your wallet in one of the convenient ways. We recommend using the “Tonkeeper” wallet.
2-ST_STEP_DESCRIPTION: Enter the amount you want to invest in the input field. Also, select the period for which you want to invest.
3-ST_STEP_DESCRIPTION: Receive and withdraw the dividends you have earned.
1-ST_ADVANTAGE_DESCRIPTION: Connect your wallet in one of the convenient ways. We recommend using the “Tonkeeper” wallet.
2-ST_ADVANTAGE_DESCRIPTION: You can start your staking journey with just 1 TON, bypassing the traditional requirement of a minimum stake of 10,000 TON.
3-ST_ADVANTAGE_DESCRIPTION: Your assets are safe and under your control thanks to a proven smart contract on the TON blockchain.
1-ST_DROPDOWN_ANSWER_TITLE: What is the minimum withdrawal amount?
2-ST_DROPDOWN_ANSWER_TITLE: How to stake TON using Tonstakers?
2-ST_DROPDOWN_ANSWER_DESCRIPTION: Click the “Connect wallet” button in the center or in the upper right corner. Then choose your wallet and confirm access to the Tonstakers application.
3-ST_DROPDOWN_ANSWER_TITLE: How does the referral program work?
